title: refunds
body:

replies.body: Each account has 3 refund tokens they can used if within 90 days, per the [refund](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) guidelines.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're out of tokens, and we'll see if there's anything we can do for you!
